Trade/Device Name(s): IMDx Flu A/B and RSV for Abbott m2000
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for IMDx Flu A/B and RSV for Abbott m2000, a multiplex real-time RT-PCR assay for detection of influenza A, influenza B, and RSV RNA from nasopharyngeal swabs.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro assay performed on the Abbott m2000 System for the detection of influenza A, influenza B, and RSV RNA directly from nasopharyngeal swabs from patients with respiratory infection symptoms; intended as an aid in diagnosing influenza A, B, and/or RSV infection.
